snippet: Explosions blasted through the capital, Bissau, and the military sealed off the city’s downtown area and lobbed grenades at the prime minister’s home on Thursday.
abstract: Explosions blast through Bissau, the capital of Guinea-Bissau, and the military seals off the city's downtown area and lobs grenades at the residence of Prime Min Carlos Gomes Jr, who is favored to win presidential runoff election.
lead_paragraph: Explosions blasted through the capital, Bissau, and the military sealed off the city’s downtown area and lobbed grenades at the prime minister’s home on Thursday.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
